body_html:
From what I could understand, the implementation for backward have been moved to Aten in the master branch while for 0.3.1 ,it is in torch/nn/_functions/thnn/sparse.py

Also the function embedding_dense_backward seems to be declared and not defined.

And as for sparse as backpropper mentioned , Sparse do not have stride

Can anyone please advice and guide. I am a little bit lost here.
body_text:
From what I could understand, the implementation for backward have been moved to Aten in the master branch while for 0.3.1 ,it is in torch/nn/_functions/thnn/sparse.py

And as for sparse as backpropper mentioned , Sparse do not have stride

body:
From what I could understand, the implementation for backward have been moved to Aten in the master branch while for 0.3.1 ,it is in torch/nn/_functions/thnn/sparse.py

Also the function `embedding_dense_backward` seems to be declared and not defined.

And as for sparse as backpropper mentioned , Sparse do not have stride

Can anyone please advice and guide. I am a little bit lost here.
